turkish_example_sentence: Sen hatalı kararı yapmamışsan, işletme başarılı olurdu.
english_example_sentence: If you had not made the wrong decision, the business would have been successful.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты не принял неправильное решение, бизнес был бы успешным.
